content:
A doctor studying nutrition collected data on the heights (in meters) of children in America. The table below shows the mean heights for children of different ages in the study.
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
||||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Age (years)** | $5$ | $6$ | $8$ | $10$ | $12$ 
**Height (meters)** | $1.1$ | $1.2$ | $1.3$ | $1.4$ | $1.5$
